title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.14 - Matters to be referred to stewards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.14 - Matters to be referred to stewards

State Regulations

For disobedience of the starter's orders at the
starting post or for attempting any unfair advantage, the starter may refer the
matter to the stewards for action, but any penalty shall not take effect until
after the last race of the day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4034.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
